name: Gmail - Solarized (Light)
description: Update the Gmail interface to use the Solarized color scheme by Ethan Schoonover (http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized).  See also style 55968.
additional_info:
- Stylish (in Chrome) sometimes fails to replace the background color on initial launch.  Refreshing (F5) usually fixes the problem.
- Currently doesn't modify the label colors; you'll have to choose your own using Gmail's interface.
- Let me know if you find UI elements that haven't been themed properly!
- 2011-11-11: Added Buzz styles.
- 2011-11-12: Updated to match Google's recent changes.
- 2011-12-04: Updated for new Google Bar
